entries.description: TagResource API now throws ServiceQuotaExceededException when the number of tags on the Amazon EVS resource exceeds the maximum allowed. TooManyTagsException is deprecated.
This release adds the ability for customers to attach and detach their EBS volumes to EKS-orchestrated HyperPod cluster nodes.
